holes.original_proof:
rw [hA]
norm_num [Set.ncard_eq_zero, Set.eq_empty_iff_forall_not_mem, Prod.ext_iff]
try decide
try {norm_num <;> aesop
}
try {norm_num [Set.ncard_eq_zero, Set.eq_empty_iff_forall_not_mem, Prod.ext_iff] at * <;> aesop
}

exact
  Set.infinite_of_injective_forall_mem (fun k l hkl => by simp_all [Prod.ext_iff] <;> (try norm_num at * <;> linarith))
    h8
